credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
dimensions: Frame: 50.2 x 39.7 cm (19 3/4 x 15 5/8 in.)-matted w/ a + c
title: "The Mermaid Window", Design for Stained Glass Window for the A.H. Barney Residence, New York, NY
medium: Color crayon, brush and gold paint on off-white wove paper
description: Central panel. Mermaid sits in underwater scene with head bowed, and looks into a seashell. Seaweed curves above in arched top as two fish swim above the mermaid.
name: Drawing
